name: Monkey Tree
description:
All the trees in the forest have died. But there is still hope. Elmo is a monkey that is trying to save his homeland.

Controls:

  • ASDW / Arrow Keys:  Movement
  • F: Interact
  • Space Bar: Jump

There is a total of 13 stages :)

Checkpoint flags let your restart the game from the stage that has the last activated flag.

Credits:

This version of this game was created to My First Game Jam: 2022 in 5 days.

Thank you so much for playing
